forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 44. Southwest wind 9 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 32 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 28. West wind 2 to 9 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph.

weather_report:
Today, Boston greets us with mostly sunny skies, casting a soft light over the city. The temperature, expected to peak around a crisp 44 degrees, suggests a day that is both invigorating and refreshing, although the brisk southwest wind, which can gust up to 32 mph, lends an edge that demands attentiveness. This airy chill mingles with the promise of clearer skies tonight, when the temperatures will settle into the low 20s, making for a tranquil evening under the stars.

In light of these conditions, it is wise to dress warmly—layers will serve you well, allowing for comfort as you venture outside. A sturdy coat and perhaps a light scarf will shield you from the playful winds. With this delightful weather, consider taking a leisurely stroll along the Charles River or visiting a cozy café to savor a cup of coffee while watching the world pass by. The vibrant life of the city, bathed in the gentle warmth of the sun and accented by the crisp air, invites moments of quiet contemplation and enjoyment amidst the everyday bustle.
